title: Fort Frederica National Monument: Nature
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature             Nature       Fort Frederica National Monument is part of the Southeast Coast Inventory and Monitoring Network. This network allows parks to pull their resources together to inventory and monitor the natural resources of each park. Below are resource briefs that have been completed.  Fort Frederica Amphibian Brief  Fort Frederica Weather and Climate Brief  Fort Frederica Plant Community Resource Brief
